attributes.action: not to sell off part of the Royal Mail and force thousands of employees out of a job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: instead give the royal mail the finances it needs to modernise its service and KEEP the employees in their jobs. especially in this time of recession do not make thousands of Royal Mail employees redundant. you have bailed out the banks so now help this national institution!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
